name: Addictive Balance
description:
Addictive Balance is a modern twist on a classic game!

The rules are simple. Keep the ball bouncing inside the circle.


WARNING : EXTREMELY ADDICTIVE!!

Your goal is to keep the ball bouncing inside the circle. All you need is one paddle and your reflexes. You can control only the direction of paddle movement just by tapping the screen. The rules are simple but still demanding.
